#### ﻿菜单

###### Build

- Package

  生成 Unity Package



#### 配置文件

package.json

```
{
  "name": "com.xxx.yyy",
  "displayName": "name",
  "version": "0.0.1",
  "unity": "2018.3",
  "description": "description",
  "keywords": [
    "unity"
  ],
  "category": "Unity",
  "repoPackagePath": "../UnityPackages"
}
```



扩展成员

- repoPackagePath

  生成包的位置，相对于项目目录



[Unity Package Manager 文档](https://docs.unity3d.com/Packages/com.unity.package-manager-ui@1.8/manual/index.html)
